verses.verse: Look what kind of love the Father has given to us, that we should be called "The Children of God"! Because of this, the world cannot know us, because it didn't know him either.
Beloved, we are now children of God, and it is not clear what we will be, but we know that when he appears, we will be like him, because we will see him as he is.
Everyone having this hope in Him purifies himself, just as He is pure.
Everyone doing sin also is doing lawlessness, and sin is lawlessness.
And you are aware that he appeared to take away our sins, and there is no sin in him.
Everyone remaining in him does not keep on sinning. Everyone who keeps on sinning has not seen or known him.
Little children, let no one deceive you; he who does what is right is righteous just as he is righteous.
The one who keeps on sinning is of the Devil, because the devil keeps on sinning from the beginning. The Son of God appeared for this very reason that he might destroy the works of the Devil.
Everyone who has been born of God doesn't keep on sinning, because his seed remains in him, and he cannot keep on sinning, because he is born of God.
God's children and the Devil's children are plainly recognized by this: whoever does not do what is right is not of God, nor he who doesn't love his brother.
For this is the message that you heard from the beginning, that we must love one another.
We must not be like Cain; he was of the wicked one and killed his brother. Why did he kill him? Because his deeds were evil, while his brother's righteous.
Do not be surprised, my brethren, if the world hates you.
We know that we have passed from death to life, because we love the brethren. The one who doesn't love his brother continues in death.
Whoever hates his brother is a murderer, and you know that no murderer has eternal life living in him.
By this we know [God's] love: he laid down his life for us, and we should lay our lives down for the brethren.
Now, whoever has this world's goods, sees his brother have need, and closes his heart to him; how can God's love live in him?
My little children let us love not in words and speech but in actions and truth.
By this we will know we are of the truth and calm our hearts in his presence,
because if our heart condemns us, God is greater than our heart and knows everything.
Beloved, if our heart doesn't condemn us, then we have confidence in God's presence.
Whatever we ask for, we receive from him, because we obey his commandments and do those things that are pleasing in his sight.
This is his commandment: that we believe in the name of his Son, Jesus Christ, and love one another as he commanded us.
The one who obeys his commandments lives in him, and he in him. By the Spirit that he has given us, we know that he lives in us.
